mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community (name, category_key, description, cover_url, creator_id, member_count, topic_count, status, create_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{categoryKey}, #{description}, #{coverUrl}, #{creatorId}, #{memberCount}, #{topicCount}, #{status}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM community WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE community SET member_count = member_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE community SET member_count = GREATEST(member_count - 1, 0) WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE community SET topic_count = topic_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
